website_summaries.verdict: A large set with accessories and 6 fun characters that will give youngsters a hands-on way to create imaginative play to match their online game experiences.
pros: An impressive set that comes with 6 characters including "RoCitizens" and others from the brand's popular games
Has lots of mix and match pieces
Perfect replicas to the games' characters
cons: A few concerns about authenticity, as some sets arrived with individually wrapped pieces
Some small accessories can break easily

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BE FOOLED BY THE REVIEWS
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant at first to buy this because of all the reviews said that no code and there was no but surprised to find out after I ordered some that it came in the box with a code and everything. Unlike the reviews they are also well made and the real thing. Don't be fooled by the reviews saying there's no code because (at least for me) I got a code and it came in a box. Overall it's a good product that comes with with a free item code that you can redeem in Roblox.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Paterson

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my nephew for Christmas. He plays this game online religiously! He loves the figures. In fact i bought more for him for his birthday he likes them so much! I rated the price 4 stars. Not because of amazons price, but because of the price the company sells them in general. I feel they’re kind of expensive for the size of the figures!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great cake toppers that turn into fun toys
customer_reviews.text: My eight year old loved these toppers on his home made cake! And he enjoys being able to interchange the pieces with different figures.
customer_reviews.author: Manu

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied buyer
customer_reviews.text: My son was so happy and I’m glad the toy is not fake coz some are selling imitation and my son can easily recognize if real or not
customer_reviews.author: Daphne A

customer_reviews.title: Great Gifts for kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my Grandson I obviously have no idea what they are But I’m happy with the quality

customer_reviews.title: Nice size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for one of my youngest grandsons. They aren't too small for him, and he loves playing with them. Thank You

customer_reviews.title: Cute as a cake topper
customer_reviews.text: Cute figures, used for cake toppers for my son and then he was able to play with after.

customer_reviews.title: Love Roblox

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for a great price!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my 7 Year old son and he loves it.

customer_reviews.title: My son loves these!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these and plays with them all the time. Great quality. Lot of little extras included.

customer_reviews.title: Really nice set of figures
customer_reviews.text: These were great! They are real Roblox figures. They have accessories that are interchangeable. Our 8 year old loves them

customer_reviews.title: 👍

customer_reviews.title: arrived quicky

customer_reviews.title: Roblox 6 figures

customer_reviews.title: Great deal must buy !!

customer_reviews.text: Cute toy for my 4 year old, he loves Roblox

customer_reviews.title: Gift toy
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift. It was convenient and not a bad price.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with my purchase despite negative reviews
customer_reviews.text: Since I was leery due to so many poor reviews stating it wasnt a boxed package- I ordered 3 and all 3 were in their box with a valid redemption code. No chipping paint or poor quality.

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids are really into these. It was a fun way to let them pick out what they wanted. Great item

customer_reviews.title: What a great birthday present for my five-year-old grandson
customer_reviews.text: Just as described, very cool product for the price just as explained in the description. My grandson loves them

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Kids gift
customer_reviews.text: These were bought as a Christmas gift for my nephew and he loves them. Your kids will love them too. There are 6 figures that come in this set. A+
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

product_meta.title: Roblox Action Collection - Citizens of Roblox Six Figure Pack [Includes Exclusive Virtual Item]
product_meta.description: Experience the hustle and bustle of city life with iconic characters from popular Roblox games including Firebrand1's RoCitizens, TwentyTwoPilots' Ultimate Driving: Westover Islands, RoyStanford's Redwood Prison, and HiddoYT's Hospital Roleplay! Imagine wacky crossover scenarios with this ultimate Roblox role-playing sim toy collection and invite new Robloxians to your city! Embark on a new career, make new friends, or just hang out in the neighborhood. Includes: 6 Figures, Accessories, Collector's Checklist, and an Exclusive Virtual Item Code
feature_bullets: Join six famous characters from the world of Roblox and create your own imaginative adventures
Mix and match parts to build your own unique Roblox character
Deck out your figures with the included accessories
Each package comes with a redeemable code to unlock an exclusive virtual item on Roblox
Collect all your favorite Roblox figures today

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars402 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
